item.title: E-Commerce Video Editor | Pinterest Ads Campaign Manager | General Virtual Assistance - Upwork
item.description:
I am a Shopify e-commerce website owner who is looking for help with product advertisement video editing as well as ad campaign creation (primarily on Pinterest) If you are excited about the opportunity and feel like you would be a good fit, please let me know the following things before we proceed:

Availability: How many hours per week are you available to work?

Video Editing Experience: Which video editing software have you used in the past? Do you have experience with creating engaging e-commerce product advertisements?

Communication & Coordination: We will be communicating via WhatsApp and using Notion to coordinate work with my product launch workflow, which we will use to track tasks that need to be completed or have been completed. Are you comfortable with these tools?

English Proficiency: Are you good with reading and writing in English? You may also be required to respond to customer support emails and/or communicate with others to finish tasks in a timely manner.

Start Date: When are you ready to get started?

Key Responsibilities:

- Edit and produce engaging video advertisements for various products.
- Setup ad campaigns properly on Pinterest.
- Track and manage tasks through Notion to ensure all deadlines are met.
- Communicate effectively through WhatsApp and coordinate with others when required.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Proven experience in basic video editing and producing high-quality, engaging advertisements.
- Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
- Strong English reading and writing skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Familiarity with the Pinterest ads dashboard is preferred*
- Experience with Shopify is preferred*
- Experience with WhatsApp and Notion is preferred*

If you meet the above requirements and are interested in the position, please reply to this listing with the requested information. I look forward to discussing this opportunity with you further.

Thank you.


Posted On: June 16, 2024 02:36 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:ChatGPT, CapCut, WhatsApp, Notion, Video Editing, Ad Campaign, Pinterest Ads Manager
